title: Joanna Coles: "Love Rules"
description: Fitting for Valentine's Day - Michael's conversation with Joanna Coles, author of "Love Rules: How to Find a Real Relationship in a Digital World." She is the chief content officer for Hearst Magazines. Original air date 12 April 2018. The book was published on 10 April 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Joanna Coles)
